alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Northern Livingston; St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:49PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ST. HELENA, NORTHWESTERN LIVINGSTON, SOUTHEASTERN EAST FELICIANA, WEST CENTRAL TANGIPAHOA AND NORTHEASTERN EAST BATON ROUGE PARISHES THROUGH 515 PM CDT... At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Pride, or 14 miles northeast of Denham Springs, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Denham Springs, Clinton, Greensburg, Walker, Amite City, Independence, Slaughter, Montpelier, Pride, Watson, Darlington, and Greenwell Spring. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 13 and 15. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 39 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Northern Livingston; St. Helena
